name: Dino Survival Evolution Battle
description:
Hunt other dinosaurs and grow! This is a real dinosaur war!

You are a cool dinosaur living in Mesozoic era. This age is quite dangerous, if you are weak and shy, you’ll be eaten soon. You have to be powerful hunter, you have to hunt other dinosaurs (yes, you have no friends here) to survive. Dino Survival Evolution Battle – you are alone against all, try to become a boss of this area!

Your goal is to attack dinosaurs which are smaller than you and beware of dinosaurs which are bigger than you. Score points – you can spend it later and buy something extra cool. By hunting other dinosaurs you’ll become bigger, and one day you’ll be the biggest dino in the world!

Dino Survival Evolution Battle GAME FEATURES:
- You are a dinosaur and you can eat other dinosaurs;
- You can become a really huge dinosaur and frighten everyone around;
- You can buy cool sunglasses, cool hats and other cool stuff to become even more cooler;
- As you can see, graphics is cool too;
- So this game coolness level is extremely high.

Dino Survival Evolution Battle – enjoy evolution and GROW! You are the first dino – dino hunter in the world, you should be proud of yourself!
